text:
Sakuya, is that magazine...
the one Kogane and I were featured in before?
The photos are still beautiful, aren't they...!

Hehe, thank you.
I also really like them.

We had such a calm and wonderful time during that photo shoot,
It's like the atmosphere of that moment was captured.

...While I love the lively atmosphere
when all of L'Antica is together...

Having moments like this, where you can
focus on one member, is also really nice.

Yeah...
You can really get to know the other person well.

Indeed. Because they're important to you,
you want to know them even better, right?
──Of course, that includes you too, right?
